info.description: This is a server Web API for I/O Controls' Cloud Advantage Telematics System (CATS).  You can find out more about CATS at [http://cloud.iocontrols.com/ioc/index.php/cats-2/](http://cloud.iocontrols.com/ioc/index.php/cats-2/).
info.title: I/O Controls CATS Web API Document

tags.name: user
tags.description: Retrieve user related information from server.

externalDocs.description: Find out more about our products

post.summary: Create or update fleet on the system

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Fleet object that needs to be added to the System

put.summary: Create a new fleet on the system

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Fleet object that needs to be added to the System

get.description: Multiple status values can be provided with comma separated strings

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status values that need to be considered for filter

get.summary: Returns fleet information by fleet id (Req. 2-2, 7-0)

post.summary: Updates a fleet with form data

parameters.name: fleetId
parameters.description: ID of fleet that needs to be updated

delete.summary: Deletes a particular fleet from database

post.summary: uploads an image for the particular fleet

parameters.name: additionalMetadata
parameters.description: Additional data to pass to server

get.summary: Finds vehicle maintenance log information (Req. 7-0 & 9-0), pass in year and month to received monthly total, use result_count for daily total. Pass in result_count = 10 for last 10 days.  Pass in certain month (1 to 12) for month values.
get.description: Returns a vehicle Maint log information

parameters.name: result_count
parameters.description: Pass in how many result desire

get.summary: Finds vehicle routine log file information (Req. 8-0 )
get.description: Returns a vehicle routine log information

parameters.name: result_count
parameters.description: Pass in how many result desire

get.description: Returns a vehicle connection and debug log status

parameters.name: result_count
parameters.description: Pass in how many result desire

post.description: Returns a single vehicle preventive maintenance setting information
Updates a single vehicle preventive maintenance setting information
This can only be done by the logged in user.

post.summary: Creates list of users with given input array
Creates list of users with given input array

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password for login in clear text

X-Rate-Limit.description: calls per hour allowed by the user

X-Expires-After.description: date in UTC when token expires

get.summary: Logs out current logged in user session
Gets user information by user name

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The name that needs to be fetched. Use user1 for testing.

put.description: This can only be done by the logged in user.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: name that need to be updated

delete.summary: Deletes user from system or mark as inactive
delete.description: This can only be done by the logged in user.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The name that needs to be deleted

get.summary: Gets user notification by user name (Req. 2-1)

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Retrieve all related alert and notifications for current logged in user.

post.summary: Updates user notitification by user name

parameters.name: alert_id
parameters.description: Retrieve all related alert and notifications for current logged in user.

parameters.description: Retrieve all related alert and notifications for current logged in user.

parameters.description: Retrieve all related alert and notifications for current logged in user.
